com.tealium.collect.listeners

Interface AudienceUpdateListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.tealium.collect.listeners.CollectUpdateListener, java.util.EventListener, MainListener

    public interface AudienceUpdateListener
extends com.tealium.collect.listeners.CollectUpdateListener
    Implementers of this class can subscribe to Audience updates by adding the listener to Tealium.Config.getEventListeners().

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAudienceUpdate(AudienceAttribute oldAudience, AudienceAttribute newAudience)
      Indicate that an Audience has changed for this visitor.

    • Method Detail

      • onAudienceUpdate

        void onAudienceUpdate(AudienceAttribute oldAudience,
                    AudienceAttribute newAudience)
        Indicate that an Audience has changed for this visitor.
        Parameters:
        oldAudience - former audience this visitor was a member of. If null, the newAudience was added.
        newAudience - current audience this visitor is a member of. If null, the oldAudience was removed.
